titleStmt.title: Astrology proved harmless, useful, pious. Being a sermon / written by Richard Carpenter.
titleStmt.author: Carpenter, Richard, d. 1670?

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Ja: Cottrel, for John Allen at the Rising Sun, and Joseph Barber at the Lamb in Paul's Church-yard.,

notesStmt.note: Annotation on Thomason copy: "January 1st"; the 7 in the imprint date has been crossed out and replaced with a "6".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
